org.apache.giraph.utils

类 WritableUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.utils.WritableUtils

  • public class WritableUtils
extends Object
    Helper static methods for working with Writable objects.

    • 方法详细资料

      • readFieldsFromByteArray

        public static void readFieldsFromByteArray(byte[] byteArray,
                           org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable writableObject)
        Read fields from byteArray to a Writeable object.
        参数:
        byteArray - Byte array to find the fields in.
        writableObject - Object to fill in the fields.

      • readFieldsFromZnode

        public static void readFieldsFromZnode(ZooKeeperExt zkExt,
                       String zkPath,
                       boolean watch,
                       org.apache.zookeeper.data.Stat stat,
                       org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable writableObject)
        Read fields from a ZooKeeper znode.
        参数:
        zkExt - ZooKeeper instance.
        zkPath - Path of znode.
        watch - Add a watch?
        stat - Stat of znode if desired.
        writableObject - Object to read into.

      • writeToByteArray

        public static byte[] writeToByteArray(org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable writableObject)
        Write object to a byte array.
        参数:
        writableObject - Object to write from.
        返回:
        Byte array with serialized object.

      • readFieldsFromByteArrayWithSize

        public static void readFieldsFromByteArrayWithSize(byte[] byteArray,
                                   org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable writableObject,
                                   boolean unsafe)
        Read fields from byteArray to a Writeable object, skipping the size. Serialization method is choosable
        参数:
        byteArray - Byte array to find the fields in.
        writableObject - Object to fill in the fields.
        unsafe - Use unsafe deserialization

      • writeToByteArrayWithSize

        public static byte[] writeToByteArrayWithSize(org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable writableObject,
                              boolean unsafe)
        Write object to a byte array with the first 4 bytes as the size of the entire buffer (including the size).
        参数:
        writableObject - Object to write from.
        unsafe - Use unsafe serialization?
        返回:
        Byte array with serialized object.

      • writeToByteArrayWithSize

        public static byte[] writeToByteArrayWithSize(org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable writableObject,
                              byte[] buffer,
                              boolean unsafe)
        Write object to a byte array with the first 4 bytes as the size of the entire buffer (including the size).
        参数:
        writableObject - Object to write from.
        buffer - Use this buffer instead
        unsafe - Use unsafe serialization?
        返回:
        Byte array with serialized object.

      • writeToZnode

        public static ZooKeeperExt.PathStat writeToZnode(ZooKeeperExt zkExt,
                                 String zkPath,
                                 int version,
                                 org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable writableObject)
        Write object to a ZooKeeper znode.
        参数:
        zkExt - ZooKeeper instance.
        zkPath - Path of znode.
        version - Version of the write.
        writableObject - Object to write from.
        返回:
        Path and stat information of the znode.

      • writeListToByteArray

        public static byte[] writeListToByteArray(List<? extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> writableList)
        Write list of object to a byte array.
        参数:
        writableList - List of object to write from.
        返回:
        Byte array with serialized objects.

      • writeListToZnode

        public static ZooKeeperExt.PathStat writeListToZnode(ZooKeeperExt zkExt,
                                     String zkPath,
                                     int version,
                                     List<? extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> writableList)
        Write list of objects to a ZooKeeper znode.
        参数:
        zkExt - ZooKeeper instance.
        zkPath - Path of znode.
        version - Version of the write.
        writableList - List of objects to write from.
        返回:
        Path and stat information of the znode.

      • readListFieldsFromByteArray

        public static <T extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> List<T> readListFieldsFromByteArray(byte[] byteArray,
                                                                            Class<? extends T> writableClass,
                                                                            org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        Read fields from byteArray to a list of objects.
        类型参数:
        T - Object type
        参数:
        byteArray - Byte array to find the fields in.
        writableClass - Class of the objects to instantiate.
        conf - Configuration used for instantiation (i.e Configurable)
        返回:
        List of objects.

      • readListFieldsFromZnode

        public static <T extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> List<T> readListFieldsFromZnode(ZooKeeperExt zkExt,
                                                                        String zkPath,
                                                                        boolean watch,
                                                                        org.apache.zookeeper.data.Stat stat,
                                                                        Class<? extends T> writableClass,
                                                                        org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        Read fields from a ZooKeeper znode into a list of objects.
        类型参数:
        T - Object type
        参数:
        zkExt - ZooKeeper instance.
        zkPath - Path of znode.
        watch - Add a watch?
        stat - Stat of znode if desired.
        writableClass - Class of the objects to instantiate.
        conf - Configuration used for instantiation (i.e Configurable)
        返回:
        List of objects.

      • writeVertexToByteArray

        public static <I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> byte[] writeVertexToByteArray(Vertex<I,V,E,M> vertex,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        byte[] buffer,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        boolean unsafe,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration<I,V,E,M> conf)
        Write vertex data to byte array with the first 4 bytes as the size of the entire buffer (including the size).
        类型参数:
        I - Vertex id
        V - Vertex value
        E - Edge value
        M - Message value
        参数:
        vertex - Vertex to write from.
        buffer - Use this buffer instead
        unsafe - Use unsafe serialization?
        conf - Configuration
        返回:
        Byte array with serialized object.

      • writeVertexToByteArray

        public static <I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> byte[] writeVertexToByteArray(Vertex<I,V,E,M> vertex,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        boolean unsafe,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration<I,V,E,M> conf)
        Write vertex data to byte array with the first 4 bytes as the size of the entire buffer (including the size).
        类型参数:
        I - Vertex id
        V - Vertex value
        E - Edge value
        M - Message value
        参数:
        vertex - Vertex to write from.
        unsafe - Use unsafe serialization?
        conf - Configuration
        返回:
        Byte array with serialized object.

      • reinitializeVertexFromByteArray

        public static <I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> void reinitializeVertexFromByteArray(byte[] byteArray,
                                                                                                                                                                                                               Vertex<I,V,E,M> vertex,
                                                                                                                                                                                                               boolean unsafe,
                                                                                                                                                                                                               ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration<I,V,E,M> conf)
        Read vertex data from byteArray to a Writeable object, skipping the size. Serialization method is choosable. Assumes the vertex has already been initialized and contains values for Id, value, and edges.
        类型参数:
        I - Vertex id
        V - Vertex value
        E - Edge value
        M - Message value
        参数:
        byteArray - Byte array to find the fields in.
        vertex - Vertex to fill in the fields.
        unsafe - Use unsafe deserialization
        conf - Configuration

      • writeEdge

        public static <I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> void writeEdge(DataOutput out,
                                                                                                         Edge<I,E> edge)
                      throws IOException
        Write an edge to an output stream.
        类型参数:
        I - Vertex id
        E - Edge value
        参数:
        out - Data output
        edge - Edge to write
        抛出:
        IOException

      • readEdge

        public static <I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> void readEdge(DataInput in,
                                                                                                        Edge<I,E> edge)
                     throws IOException
        Read an edge from an input stream.
        类型参数:
        I - Vertex id
        E - Edge value
        参数:
        in - Data input
        edge - Edge to fill in-place
        抛出:
        IOException

      • reinitializeVertexFromDataInput

        public static <I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> void reinitializeVertexFromDataInput(DataInput input,
                                                                                                                                                                                                               Vertex<I,V,E,M> vertex,
                                                                                                                                                                                                               ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration<I,V,E,M> conf)
                                            throws IOException
        Reads data from input stream to inizialize Vertex. Assumes the vertex has already been initialized and contains values for Id, value, and edges.
        类型参数:
        I - Vertex id
        V - Vertex value
        E - Edge value
        M - Message value
        参数:
        input - The input stream
        vertex - The vertex to initialize
        conf - Configuration
        抛出:
        IOException

      • readVertexFromDataInput

        public static <I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> Vertex<I,V,E,M> readVertexFromDataInput(DataInput input,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration<I,V,E,M> conf)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 throws IOException
        Reads data from input stream to inizialize Vertex.
        类型参数:
        I - Vertex id
        V - Vertex value
        E - Edge value
        M - Message value
        参数:
        input - The input stream
        conf - Configuration
        返回:
        The vertex
        抛出:
        IOException

      • writeVertexToDataOutput

        public static <I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> void writeVertexToDataOutput(DataOutput output,
                                                                                                                                                                                                       Vertex<I,V,E,M> vertex,
                                                                                                                                                                                                       ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration<I,V,E,M> conf)
                                    throws IOException
        Writes Vertex data to output stream.
        类型参数:
        I - Vertex id
        V - Vertex value
        E - Edge value
        M - Message value
        参数:
        output - the output stream
        vertex - The vertex to serialize
        conf - Configuration
        抛出:
        IOException
